name: e.r.f.
description:
Made at the ROM Game Jam 2015

erf rescue force, assemble!

Protect the erf from menacing asteroids! Deflect them with mass driver cannons, or mine them to fuel your research efforts. Smaller asteroids need to be detected by the scanner. Keep researching technology until you unlock the Colony Ship to save erf!

Two gamepads highly recommended!

Keyboard controls:

Player 1: WASD, Left Control, E

Player 1: IJKL, Right Control, O
